roleset.name: to telephone
roleset.note: PHONE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'phone' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from phone.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: If directors or producers phone me and say [0] they know ` Liz , ' I know [0]they 've never met her .

example.name: prepositional Arg2
example.text: He phoned them with updates on the investment , such as `` funny things that [*T*-1] happened at the well that week , '' he says [0][*T*-2] .
example.arg: with updates on the investment , such as `` funny things that [*T*-1] happened at the well that week

example.name: Arg2 as a VP
example.text: Mr. Seidman said yesterday , for example , that Sen. Dennis DeConcini ( D. , Ariz. ) , who [*T*-2] received $ 48,100 [*U*]in contributions from Mr. Keating , phoned Mr. Seidman [*] to request that he push for a sale of Lincoln before it would be seized [*-1] .
